translations.chinese: 人或說項王曰：「關中阻山河四塞，地肥饒，可都以霸。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu then led twenty thousand men to fight Qin at Julu.

context.previous: 收其貨寶婦女而東。
context.next: 項王見秦宮皆以燒殘破，又心懷思欲東歸，曰：「富貴不歸故鄉，如衣繡夜行，誰知之者！」

translations.chinese: 項王見秦宮皆以燒殘破，又心懷思欲東歸，曰：「富貴不歸故鄉，如衣繡夜行，誰知之者！」
translations.english: Xiang Yu's army was hungry and tired, but he made a great battle, defeated Qin forces.

context.previous: 人或說項王曰：「關中阻山河四塞，地肥饒，可都以霸。」
context.next: 說者曰：「人言楚人沐猴而冠耳，果然。」

translations.chinese: 說者曰：「人言楚人沐猴而冠耳，果然。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu then led the princes' armies south, attacked Qin at Julu again.

context.previous: 項王見秦宮皆以燒殘破，又心懷思欲東歸，曰：「富貴不歸故鄉，如衣繡夜行，誰知之者！」
context.next: 項王聞之，烹說者。

translations.chinese: 項王聞之，烹說者。
translations.english: Xiang Yu's army was at the front, the princes' armies followed behind.

context.previous: 說者曰：「人言楚人沐猴而冠耳，果然。」

translations.chinese: 項王使人致命懷王。
translations.english: When they reached the Yin Mountains, Xiang Yu ordered the princes' armies to cut paths through the mountains.

context.next: 懷王曰：「如約。」

translations.chinese: 懷王曰：「如約。」
translations.english: The princes' armies cut paths, Xiang Yu feared they would take advantage, secretly ordered the strong Chu army to follow behind and kill them.

context.previous: 項王使人致命懷王。
context.next: 乃尊懷王為義帝。

translations.chinese: 乃尊懷王為義帝。
translations.english: When the princes' armies entered the passes, Xiang Yu sealed the passes, did not let them enter.

context.previous: 懷王曰：「如約。」
context.next: 項王欲自王，先王諸將相。

translations.chinese: 項王欲自王，先王諸將相。
translations.english: He stationed troops to guard the passes, then led the Chu army west alone.

context.previous: 乃尊懷王為義帝。
context.next: 謂曰：「天下初發難時，假立諸侯後以伐秦。

translations.chinese: 謂曰：「天下初發難時，假立諸侯後以伐秦。
translations.english: When Xiang Yu reached Hangu Pass, the Qin forces were still many.

context.previous: 項王欲自王，先王諸將相。
context.next: 然身被堅執銳首事，暴露於野三年，滅秦定天下者，皆將相諸君與籍之力也。

translations.chinese: 然身被堅執銳首事，暴露於野三年，滅秦定天下者，皆將相諸君與籍之力也。
translations.english: Xiang Yu attacked, defeated Qin, entered Hangu Pass.

context.previous: 謂曰：「天下初發難時，假立諸侯後以伐秦。
context.next: 義帝雖無功，故當分其地而王之。」

translations.chinese: 義帝雖無功，故當分其地而王之。」
translations.english: King Yi though without merit, should still divide land and make him king.'

context.previous: 然身被堅執銳首事，暴露於野三年，滅秦定天下者，皆將相諸君與籍之力也。
context.next: 諸將皆曰：「善。」

translations.chinese: 諸將皆曰：「善。」
translations.english: The generals all said: 'Good.'

context.previous: 義帝雖無功，故當分其地而王之。」
context.next: 乃分天下，立諸將為侯王。

translations.chinese: 乃分天下，立諸將為侯王。
translations.english: Then divided the world, established the generals as marquises and kings.

context.previous: 諸將皆曰：「善。」
context.next: 項王、范增疑沛公之有天下，業已講解，又惡負約，恐諸侯叛之，乃陰謀曰：「巴、蜀道險，秦之遷人皆居蜀。」

translations.chinese: 項王、范增疑沛公之有天下，業已講解，又惡負約，恐諸侯叛之，乃陰謀曰：「巴、蜀道險，秦之遷人皆居蜀。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu and Fan Zeng suspected Liu Bang of having ambitions for the world, but having already made peace, and fearing to break the agreement and cause the lords to rebel, secretly plotted saying: 'The roads to Ba and Shu are dangerous, Qin's exiled people all live in Shu.'

context.previous: 乃分天下，立諸將為侯王。
context.next: 乃曰：「巴、蜀亦關中地也。」

translations.chinese: 乃曰：「巴、蜀亦關中地也。」
translations.english: Then said: 'Ba and Shu are also Guanzhong territory.'

context.previous: 項王、范增疑沛公之有天下，業已講解，又惡負約，恐諸侯叛之，乃陰謀曰：「巴、蜀道險，秦之遷人皆居蜀。」
context.next: 故立沛公為漢王，王巴、蜀、漢中，都南鄭。

translations.chinese: 故立沛公為漢王，王巴、蜀、漢中，都南鄭。
translations.english: Therefore established Liu Bang as Han King, ruling Ba, Shu, Hanzhong, with capital at Nanzheng.

context.previous: 乃曰：「巴、蜀亦關中地也。」
context.next: 而三分關中，王秦降將以距塞漢王。

translations.chinese: 而三分關中，王秦降將以距塞漢王。
translations.english: And divided Guanzhong into three, made Qin surrendering generals kings to block Han King.

context.previous: 故立沛公為漢王，王巴、蜀、漢中，都南鄭。
context.next: 項王乃立章邯為雍王，王咸陽以西，都廢丘。

translations.chinese: 項王乃立章邯為雍王，王咸陽以西，都廢丘。
translations.english: Xiang Yu then established Zhang Han as Yong King, ruling west of Xianyang, with capital at Feiqiu.

context.previous: 而三分關中，王秦降將以距塞漢王。
context.next: 長史欣者，故為櫟陽獄掾，嘗有德於項梁；

translations.chinese: 長史欣者，故為櫟陽獄掾，嘗有德於項梁；
translations.english: Chief Scribe Xin was formerly Queyang prison clerk, once had kindness to Xiang Liang;

context.previous: 項王乃立章邯為雍王，王咸陽以西，都廢丘。
context.next: 都尉董翳者，本勸章邯降楚。

translations.chinese: 都尉董翳者，本勸章邯降楚。
translations.english: Colonel Dong Yi originally advised Zhang Han to surrender to Chu.

context.previous: 長史欣者，故為櫟陽獄掾，嘗有德於項梁；
context.next: 故立司馬欣為塞王，王咸陽以東至河，都櫟陽；

translations.chinese: 故立司馬欣為塞王，王咸陽以東至河，都櫟陽；
translations.english: Therefore established Sima Xin as Sai King, ruling east of Xianyang to the Yellow River, with capital at Queyang;

context.previous: 都尉董翳者，本勸章邯降楚。
context.next: 立董翳為翟王，王上郡，都高奴。

translations.chinese: 立董翳為翟王，王上郡，都高奴。
translations.english: Established Dong Yi as Di King, ruling Shangjun, with capital at Gao.

context.previous: 故立司馬欣為塞王，王咸陽以東至河，都櫟陽；
context.next: 徙魏王豹為西魏王，王河東，都平陽。

translations.chinese: 徙魏王豹為西魏王，王河東，都平陽。
translations.english: When the division was completed, Xiang Yu wished to march east.

context.previous: 立董翳為翟王，王上郡，都高奴。
context.next: 瑕丘申陽者，張耳嬖臣也，先下河南（郡），迎楚河上，故立申陽為河南王，都雒陽。

translations.chinese: 瑕丘申陽者，張耳嬖臣也，先下河南（郡），迎楚河上，故立申陽為河南王，都雒陽。
translations.english: He camped at Gaixia, and the Han King Liu Bang attacked him.

context.previous: 徙魏王豹為西魏王，王河東，都平陽。
context.next: 韓王成因故都，都陽翟。

translations.chinese: 韓王成因故都，都陽翟。
translations.english: Xiang Yu said: 'Our army has fought for three years, killed generals, crossed passes, taken cities, but the enemy is many and we are few.'

context.previous: 瑕丘申陽者，張耳嬖臣也，先下河南（郡），迎楚河上，故立申陽為河南王，都雒陽。
context.next: 趙將司馬卬定河內，數有功，故立卬為殷王，王河內，都朝歌。

translations.chinese: 趙將司馬卬定河內，數有功，故立卬為殷王，王河內，都朝歌。
translations.english: He sent Long Ju to ask Han Xin to attack Qi.

context.previous: 韓王成因故都，都陽翟。
context.next: 徙趙王歇為代王。

translations.chinese: 徙趙王歇為代王。
translations.english: Han Xin said: 'The overlord is in danger, I cannot abandon him.'

context.previous: 趙將司馬卬定河內，數有功，故立卬為殷王，王河內，都朝歌。
context.next: 趙相張耳素賢，又從入關，故立耳為常山王，王趙地，都襄國。

translations.chinese: 趙相張耳素賢，又從入關，故立耳為常山王，王趙地，都襄國。
translations.english: Xiang Yu then sent Wu She to persuade Han Xin.

context.previous: 徙趙王歇為代王。
context.next: 當陽君黥布為楚將，常冠軍，故立布為九江王，都六。

translations.chinese: 當陽君黥布為楚將，常冠軍，故立布為九江王，都六。
translations.english: Wu She said: 'You and the overlord both Chu people, but you became king of Qi.

context.previous: 趙相張耳素賢，又從入關，故立耳為常山王，王趙地，都襄國。
context.next: 鄱君吳芮率百越佐諸侯，又從入關，故立芮為衡山王，都邾。

translations.chinese: 鄱君吳芮率百越佐諸侯，又從入關，故立芮為衡山王，都邾。
translations.english: Now the overlord is in danger, but you do not help, this is disloyal.'

context.previous: 當陽君黥布為楚將，常冠軍，故立布為九江王，都六。
context.next: 義帝柱國共敖將兵擊南郡，功多，因立敖為臨江王，都江陵。

translations.chinese: 義帝柱國共敖將兵擊南郡，功多，因立敖為臨江王，都江陵。
translations.english: Han Xin said: 'The overlord once made me king, I am grateful.

context.previous: 鄱君吳芮率百越佐諸侯，又從入關，故立芮為衡山王，都邾。
context.next: 徙燕王韓廣為遼東王。

translations.chinese: 徙燕王韓廣為遼東王。
translations.english: But I have heard that if the mother is kind, the son is filial; if the lord is enlightened, the minister is loyal.

context.previous: 義帝柱國共敖將兵擊南郡，功多，因立敖為臨江王，都江陵。
context.next: 燕將臧荼從楚救趙，因從入關，故立荼為燕王，都薊。

translations.chinese: 燕將臧荼從楚救趙，因從入關，故立荼為燕王，都薊。
translations.english: Now the overlord treats me with suspicion and sends someone else, this shows he does not trust me.'

context.previous: 徙燕王韓廣為遼東王。
context.next: 徙齊王田市為膠東王。

translations.chinese: 徙齊王田市為膠東王。
translations.english: Wu She returned and told Xiang Yu.

context.previous: 燕將臧荼從楚救趙，因從入關，故立荼為燕王，都薊。
context.next: 齊將田都從共救趙，因從入關，故立都為齊王，都臨菑。

translations.chinese: 齊將田都從共救趙，因從入關，故立都為齊王，都臨菑。
translations.english: Xiang Yu sent Ji Xin to attack Qi.

context.previous: 徙齊王田市為膠東王。

translations.english: Ji Xin attacked Qi, Han Xin defended Qi.

context.previous: 齊將田都從共救趙，因從入關，故立都為齊王，都臨菑。
context.next: 田榮者，數負項梁，又不肯將兵從楚擊秦，以故不封。

translations.chinese: 田榮者，數負項梁，又不肯將兵從楚擊秦，以故不封。
translations.english: Han Xin said: 'Ji Xin is brave but not strategic, I can defeat him.'

context.previous: 故秦所滅齊王建孫田安，項羽方渡河救趙，田安下濟北數城，引其兵降項羽，故立安為濟北王，都博陽。
context.next: 成安君陳餘棄將印去，不從入關，然素聞其賢，有功於趙，聞其在南皮，故因環封三縣。

translations.chinese: 成安君陳餘棄將印去，不從入關，然素聞其賢，有功於趙，聞其在南皮，故因環封三縣。
translations.english: Han Xin lured Ji Xin into a trap, captured him.

context.previous: 田榮者，數負項梁，又不肯將兵從楚擊秦，以故不封。
context.next: 番君將梅鋗功多，故封十萬戶侯。

translations.chinese: 番君將梅鋗功多，故封十萬戶侯。
translations.english: Han Xin then attacked Chu, defeated Xiang Yu at Gaixia.

context.previous: 成安君陳餘棄將印去，不從入關，然素聞其賢，有功於趙，聞其在南皮，故因環封三縣。
context.next: 項王自立為西楚霸王，王九郡，都彭城。

translations.chinese: 項王自立為西楚霸王，王九郡，都彭城。
translations.english: Xiang Yu retreated to Dongcheng.

context.previous: 番君將梅鋗功多，故封十萬戶侯。

translations.chinese: 漢之元年四月，諸侯罷戲下，各就國。
translations.english: The Chu army was few, Xiang Yu said: 'I have fought seventy battles, all victorious, captured generals, taken cities, but finally trapped here.'

context.next: 項王出之國，使人徙義帝，曰：「古之帝者地方千里，必居上游。」

translations.chinese: 項王出之國，使人徙義帝，曰：「古之帝者地方千里，必居上游。」
translations.english: He divided his army into four, each with orders to break through separately and rendezvous at Dongcheng.

context.previous: 漢之元年四月，諸侯罷戲下，各就國。
context.next: 乃使使徙義帝長沙郴縣。

translations.chinese: 乃使使徙義帝長沙郴縣。
translations.english: Xiang Yu said to the generals: 'I will take the enemy.'

context.previous: 項王出之國，使人徙義帝，曰：「古之帝者地方千里，必居上游。」
context.next: 趣義帝行，其群臣稍稍背叛之，乃陰令衡山、臨江王擊殺之江中。

translations.chinese: 趣義帝行，其群臣稍稍背叛之，乃陰令衡山、臨江王擊殺之江中。
translations.english: He rode alone, broke through the encirclement, the generals could not follow.

context.previous: 乃使使徙義帝長沙郴縣。
context.next: 韓王成無軍功，項王不使之國，與俱至彭城，廢以為侯，已又殺之。

translations.chinese: 韓王成無軍功，項王不使之國，與俱至彭城，廢以為侯，已又殺之。
translations.english: Xiang Yu reached the Wujiang River, his horse was tired, could not cross.

context.previous: 趣義帝行，其群臣稍稍背叛之，乃陰令衡山、臨江王擊殺之江中。
context.next: 臧荼之國，因逐韓廣之遼東，廣弗聽，荼擊殺廣無終，

translations.chinese: 臧荼之國，因逐韓廣之遼東，廣弗聽，荼擊殺廣無終，
translations.english: Xiang Yu said: 'Heaven wishes to destroy me, not my fault.'

context.previous: 韓王成無軍功，項王不使之國，與俱至彭城，廢以為侯，已又殺之。

translations.chinese: 田榮聞項羽徙齊王市膠東，而立齊將田都為齊王，乃大怒，不肯遣齊王之膠東，因以齊反，迎擊田都。
translations.english: He turned and fought, killed several hundred enemies, wounded himself many times.

context.next: 田都走楚。

translations.chinese: 田都走楚。
translations.english: He saw his old subordinate Lü Matong among the enemies.

context.previous: 田榮聞項羽徙齊王市膠東，而立齊將田都為齊王，乃大怒，不肯遣齊王之膠東，因以齊反，迎擊田都。
context.next: 齊王市畏項王，乃亡之膠東就國。

translations.chinese: 齊王市畏項王，乃亡之膠東就國。
translations.english: Lü Matong was formerly Xiang Yu's subordinate, Xiang Yu once captured his father but did not kill him.

context.previous: 田都走楚。
context.next: 田榮怒，追擊殺之即墨。

translations.chinese: 田榮怒，追擊殺之即墨。
translations.english: Lü Matong said: 'Today you are finished.'

context.previous: 齊王市畏項王，乃亡之膠東就國。
context.next: 榮因自立為齊王，而西殺擊濟北王田安，并王三齊。

translations.chinese: 榮因自立為齊王，而西殺擊濟北王田安，并王三齊。
translations.english: Xiang Yu laughed and said: 'I heard Han bought your head for a thousand gold and ten thousand households.'

context.previous: 田榮怒，追擊殺之即墨。
context.next: 榮與彭越將軍印，令反梁地。

translations.chinese: 榮與彭越將軍印，令反梁地。
translations.english: He drew his sword and committed suicide.

context.previous: 榮因自立為齊王，而西殺擊濟北王田安，并王三齊。
context.next: 陳餘陰使張同、夏說說齊王田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰，不平。

translations.chinese: 陳餘陰使張同、夏說說齊王田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰，不平。
translations.english: The kings of Western Chu all surrendered to Han.

context.previous: 榮與彭越將軍印，令反梁地。
context.next: 今盡王故王於醜地，而王其群臣諸將善地，逐其故主趙王，乃北居代，餘以為不可。

translations.chinese: 今盡王故王於醜地，而王其群臣諸將善地，逐其故主趙王，乃北居代，餘以為不可。
translations.english: Liu Bang became emperor, established the Han dynasty.

context.previous: 陳餘陰使張同、夏說說齊王田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰，不平。
context.next: 聞大王起兵，且不聽不義，願大王資餘兵，請以擊常山，以復趙王，請以國為捍蔽。」

translations.chinese: 聞大王起兵，且不聽不義，願大王資餘兵，請以擊常山，以復趙王，請以國為捍蔽。」
translations.english: Han Gao Zu first year, attacked Ying Bu at Jing Province.

context.previous: 今盡王故王於醜地，而王其群臣諸將善地，逐其故主趙王，乃北居代，餘以為不可。
context.next: 齊王許之，因遣兵之趙。

translations.english: Second year, attacked Chen Xi at Liang.

context.next: 陳餘悉發三縣兵，與齊并力擊常山，大破之。

translations.chinese: 陳餘悉發三縣兵，與齊并力擊常山，大破之。
translations.english: Third year, attacked Zang Tu at Yan.

context.previous: 齊王許之，因遣兵之趙。
context.next: 張耳走歸漢。

translations.chinese: 張耳走歸漢。
translations.english: Fourth year, attacked Wei Bao at Wei.

context.previous: 陳餘悉發三縣兵，與齊并力擊常山，大破之。
context.next: 陳餘迎故趙王歇於代，反之趙。

translations.english: Fifth year, attacked Tian Rong at Qi.

context.previous: 張耳走歸漢。
context.next: 趙王因立陳餘為代王。

translations.english: Sixth year, attacked Lu Wan at Yan.

context.previous: 陳餘迎故趙王歇於代，反之趙。

translations.chinese: 是時，漢還定三秦。
translations.english: Seventh year, pacified the world.

context.next: 項羽聞漢王皆已并關中，且東，齊、趙叛之：大怒。

translations.chinese: 項羽聞漢王皆已并關中，且東，齊、趙叛之：大怒。
translations.english: Han Gao Zu died, Empress Lü acted as regent.

context.next: 乃以故吳令鄭昌為韓王，以距漢。

translations.english: Wen Di ascended, practiced benevolent government.

translations.english: Jing Di ascended, continued the policies.

context.next: 彭越敗蕭公角等。

translations.english: Wu Di ascended, expanded the empire.

translations.english: Wu Di died, Zhao Di ascended.

context.previous: 彭越敗蕭公角等。

context.next: 楚以此故無西意，而北擊齊。

translations.english: Xuan Di died, Yuan Di ascended.

translations.english: Yuan Di died, Cheng Di ascended.

translations.english: Cheng Di died, Ai Di ascended.

context.previous: 徵兵九江王布。
context.next: 項王由此怨布也。

translations.chinese: 項王由此怨布也。
translations.english: Xiang Yu from this resented Bu.

context.previous: 布稱疾不往，使將將數千人行。
context.next: 漢之二年冬，項羽遂北至城陽，田榮亦將兵會戰。

translations.chinese: 漢之二年冬，項羽遂北至城陽，田榮亦將兵會戰。
translations.english: Han second year winter, Xiang Yu then went north to Chengyang, Tian Rong also led troops to battle together.

context.previous: 項王由此怨布也。
context.next: 田榮不勝，走至平原，平原民殺之。

translations.chinese: 田榮不勝，走至平原，平原民殺之。
translations.english: Tian Rong could not win, fled to Pingyuan, Pingyuan people killed him.

context.previous: 漢之二年冬，項羽遂北至城陽，田榮亦將兵會戰。
context.next: 遂北燒夷齊城郭室屋，皆阬田榮降卒，系虜其老弱婦女。

translations.english: Then went north burning and destroying Qi city walls houses, all buried Tian Rong's surrendering soldiers, captured and enslaved their old and weak women.

context.previous: 田榮不勝，走至平原，平原民殺之。
context.next: 徇齊至北海，多所殘滅。

translations.chinese: 徇齊至北海，多所殘滅。
translations.english: Marched through Qi to Beihai, destroyed much.

context.previous: 遂北燒夷齊城郭室屋，皆阬田榮降卒，系虜其老弱婦女。
context.next: 齊人相聚而叛之。

translations.chinese: 齊人相聚而叛之。
translations.english: Qi people gathered and rebelled against him.

context.previous: 徇齊至北海，多所殘滅。
context.next: 於是田榮弟田橫收齊亡卒得數萬人，反城陽。

translations.chinese: 於是田榮弟田橫收齊亡卒得數萬人，反城陽。
translations.english: Therefore Tian Rong's younger brother Tian Heng gathered Qi fleeing soldiers got tens of thousands, rebelled at Chengyang.

context.previous: 齊人相聚而叛之。
context.next: 項王因留，連戰未能下。

translations.chinese: 項王因留，連戰未能下。
translations.english: Xiang Yu stayed, fought continuously but could not take it.

context.previous: 於是田榮弟田橫收齊亡卒得數萬人，反城陽。

translations.chinese: 春，漢王部五諸侯兵，凡五十六萬人，東伐楚。
translations.english: Spring, Han King led five lords' troops, total fifty-six thousand men, attacked Chu east.

context.next: 項王聞之，即令諸將擊齊，而自以精兵三萬人南從魯出胡陵。

translations.chinese: 項王聞之，即令諸將擊齊，而自以精兵三萬人南從魯出胡陵。
translations.english: Xiang Yu heard this, immediately ordered the generals to attack Qi, while he personally with elite troops thirty thousand went south from Lu through Huling.

context.previous: 春，漢王部五諸侯兵，凡五十六萬人，東伐楚。
context.next: 四月，漢皆已入彭城，收其貨寶美人，日置酒高會。

translations.english: Fourth month, Han had all entered Pengcheng, collected its goods treasures and beauties, daily held wine feasts.
